---
title: "Temp Collinearity"
output: html_notebook
---

Looking at collinearity between temperature predictors. 

```{r setup}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(ggcorrplot)


load("spp_master_ztemp.traits_scaled.Rdata")
```

```{r narrow down to variables that we need}

reduced <- spp_master_ztemp.traits_scaled[, .SD, .SDcols = ! names(spp_master_ztemp.traits_scaled) %like% "mean"]
reduced2 <- reduced[,252:437]

```

Correlation Matrix
```{r matrix}
corr <- round(cor(reduced2), 2)

ggcorrplot(corr, outline.color = "white", tl.cex = 1, tl.srt = 90)

ggsave(file = "temp_var_correlation_plot.jpg", dpi = 1000)
?ggsave
# Get the lower triangle
ggcorrplot(corr, hc.order = TRUE, type = "lower",
     outline.col = "white")
```
